title: Factors that increase size of the human population

content.question: The increase in the size of Earth's human population in the last century has been dramatic. Which of the following identifies two major contributors to this increase?

choices.label: New methods of agriculture and the identification of new food crops
The Industrial Revolution and modern medicine
New methods of birth control and decrease warfare
Increased education for women and the development of new pesticides

content.answer: The Industrial Revolution and modern medicine

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
